resources.string: Take a close picture of your eyes.\nWorks best with good lighting.
Things seem more interesting, colors may become more intense. Feelings of hunger.
You tend to stare off into space, you feel relaxed but there is a certain haze around.
Slight vibrations in your body, hard to focus, random thoughts. Your perception of the world is very different now.
Waves of euphoria wash over your body. Very little balance. Textures stand out more.
You are completely and utterly at the mercy of the universe. Logic is gone.
